name: Spoopy's Restaurant
description:
Welcome to Spoopy's Restaurant.

Meet all kinds spooktastic creatures in Spoopy's Restaurant!

Made for the Boundless Game Jam under the theme of "One Button"!!!
Please Rate! Get to know your customers!
